rescuecore2.misc.gui

Class ShapeDebugFrame.ShapeInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • rescuecore2.misc.gui.ShapeDebugFrame.ShapeInfo
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GMLShapeInfo, OSMWayShapeInfo, ShapeDebugFrame.AWTShapeInfo, ShapeDebugFrame.Line2DShapeInfo, ShapeDebugFrame.Point2DShapeInfo, TemporaryObjectInfo
    Enclosing class:
    ShapeDebugFrame

    public abstract static class ShapeDebugFrame.ShapeInfo
extends java.lang.Object
    This class captures information about a shape that should be displayed on-screen.
